summary: Offers a property that yields an object for pure, functional array element updates, emulating in-place assignment while returning a modified copy. Supports arithmetic, reduction, custom function application, and element retrieval, with configurable out-of-bounds handling and optional assumptions about index ordering and uniqueness to improve execution efficiency.
business_intent: Enable immutable array manipulation in JAX, allowing JIT‑compiled code to perform efficient in-place‑like updates without side effects and with flexible out-of-bounds semantics.
